description:
TITLE : n-dimensional economics problem

REFERENCE :

This is the reduced economics problem (u_n = 1/x_n).

Alexander Morgan:
`Solving polynomial systems using continuation for engineering
 and scientific problems', Prentice-Hall, Englewood Cliffs, New Jersey, 1987,
(p 148).

NOTE :

Transform u = 1/x_n and the total degree equals the number of solutions.
See the reduced economics problem, in the file redeco.
